about_the_game: FC Points can be used in Football Ultimate Team™ to get Packs, enter Draft, and build your dream squad of past and present players from men’s and women’s football, or for use in the Clubs Store and the FC Hub.
detailed_description: FC Points can be used in Football Ultimate Team™ to get Packs, enter Draft, and build your dream squad of past and present players from men’s and women’s football, or for use in the Clubs Store and the FC Hub.
drm_notice: EA online activation and EA app software installation and background use required. Denuvo Anti-tamper
legal_notice:
Requires EA SPORTS FC 25 (sold separately), all game updates, internet connection & an EA Account. FC Points purchase is not available in Belgium.
FC Points optional & not required for Ultimate Team.
name: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 - FC Points

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy EA SPORTS FC™ 25 - FC Points

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-Bit (Latest Update)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5 6600k
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX: 12 Compatible video card or equivalent (feature level 12_0)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-Bit (Latest Update)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5600 XT or Nvidia GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX: 12 Compatible video card or equivalent (feature level 12_0)

esrb.interactive_elements: Users Interact, In-Game Purchases (Includes Random Items)

short_description: FC Points can be used in Football Ultimate Team™ to get Packs, enter Draft, and build your dream squad of past and present players from men’s and women’s football, or for use in the Clubs Store and the FC Hub.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech, Danish, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
